summary: Add 10 of every Skyrim ingredient, or 15 of smithing ingots.
descriptionHtml:
Hello! I didn\'t see this posted anywhere, and I made this for myself while getting irritated when trying to find/harvest certain ingredients. 

Steps:
Step 1: Put ingreget.txt/ignotget.txt it into your Skyrim directory
Step 2: Open up the console (~)
Step 3: Type \"bat ingreget\" or \"bat ignotget\" without quotes
Step 4: Either get ingredients or smithing ignots

This didn\'t take very long to assemble, and I\'m now 100% sure if ALL ingredients are in the batch file. Also I left out any and all quest specific ingredients. (There are maybe 3 or 4 of them) Enjoy~!

v1.5
I added a few missing ingredients, I removed red nirnroot from the bat file and I also fixed some o\'s that were supposed to be zeros. Comment with any issues~! 

v2
Added missing ingot and fixed the batch file for ingredients, all are now there.
author: Nekocatz
